functions.name: control_lights
functions.description: Control the lights in the room

state.description: True to turn lights on, False to turn them off

functions.name: web_search
functions.description: Search the web for real-time information

query.description: The search query to look up

functions.name: toggle_silent_mode
functions.description: Toggle silent mode on or off

state.description: True to enable silent mode, False to disable it

functions.name: slice_model
functions.description: Slice a 3D model file (STL, 3MF, etc.) using PrusaSlicer to generate G-code.

file_path.description: The name of the 3D model file (e.g., 'benchy.stl'), its number from the list, OR the full path to the file.

output_path.description: Optional. The full path where the G-code file should be saved. If not provided, a default name will be used.

functions.name: list_stl_files
functions.description: Lists all .stl, .3mf, and .obj files found in the default 3D objects folder.

functions.name: set_preference
functions.description: Sets a specific user preference, like default layer height or infill.

key.description: The name of the preference to set (e.g., 'default_layer_height').

value.description: The value to set for the preference (will be converted if needed).

functions.name: view_gcode
functions.description: Opens a specified .gcode file using the Prusa G-code Viewer.

gcode_file_path.description: The name of the .gcode file (e.g., 'benchy.gcode') located in the default folder, or the full path to the file.
